EmailTemplate.name: Whitepaper-Nurture15-new.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Join VMTurbo for a live demonstration
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Managing the virtualized environment of today is significantly more complex than just keeping the plates spinning. There are important business needs and goals that must be met:
- Assure continuous performance for all applications—especially business-critical ones - Make the best use of the physical infrastructure because it directly affects operating costs - Develop a forward-looking cost/benefit analysis for hardware refresh, higher VM density, and infrastructure growth
Sign up <http://go.vmturbo.com/request-a-demo.html> for a demo with one of our support engineers to explore how we can help you address these challenges.
Thank you,
VMTurbo 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
contact us <http://go.vmturbo.com/contact-us.html?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ticker> | website <http://www.vmturbo.com?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ticker> | privacy policy <http://www.vmturbo.com/privacy-policy?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ticker>
